dialog: Excuse me?
Many reptiles carry potentially dangerous bacteria that may pose a risk to one's health.
Ah, I was not aware of that.
It might not be the safest option for families, especially those with young children, to keep such pets.
Oh, I hadn't thought about my brother's infant daughter. Perhaps a canine companion would be a better fit for me.
Good luck in your decision, Maria.
Greetings, this is room 1205. Our message light is flashing.
One moment, if you please.
Many thanks.
I apologize for the delay. Mr. Johns requires a call from you.
Might you bring the message to my quarters?
Unfortunately, we have no available messenger at present.
Then I shall come down and retrieve the message posthaste.
Understood, we shall be waiting for you.
Care to hazard a guess? I've received some exciting news!
Pray tell, what is it?
As you are aware, I've been working as a proof-reader at The Economist, correct?
Indeed.
The editor-in-chief took note of my previous experience as an editor at another publication and has offered me the position of assistant editor.
Really? How wonderful! Will you have the opportunity to put quill to parchment?
